Steps has a special abilityâ€”a kind of synesthesiaâ€”where he can see the â€˜essenceâ€™ of a person, something he calls â€˜shine,â€™ on everything theyâ€™ve touched. His ability is known to only a few peopleâ€”his father, the director of the FBI, and his partner, Special Agent Jimmy Donovan.
When the remains of a murdered woman are found, Steps recognizes the shine left by the murderer from another crime scene with a physically similar victim. Using his skill and the resources of the Bureau, it is a race against time to find the killer before itâ€™s too late
